original_text: Then the Lord God said, ‘Why have you done this bad thing? Now your brother's blood is lying there on the ground. That is like his voice which is shouting to me for help.
korean_text: 이르시되 네가 무엇을 하였느냐 네 아우의 핏소리가 땅에서부터 내게 호소하느니라

sentences.original_text: Why have you done this bad thing?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 왜 이런 나쁜 일을 했느냐?

sentences.original_text: Now your brother's blood is lying there
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 네 형제의 피가 그곳에 흘러있구나

sentences.original_text: which is shouting to me for help
